titles.title: Transportation Security Administration 20th Anniversary Review Act
Transportation Security Administration 20th Anniversary Review Act
A bill to require a 20th anniversary review of the missions, capabilities, and performance of the Transportation Security Administration.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Transportation Security Administration 20th Anniversary Review Act
This bill requires the Transportation Security Administration (TSA) to contract with a federally funded research and development center to review and provide recommendations that address, among other topics, TSA's effectiveness in carrying out its statutory mission and specified programs.
